short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oyun severler için, Block Siege Game ile ilgili en son gelişmeleri paylaşan sitenin tarayıcı eklentisidir.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is the Chrome extension of the website, which shares the latest developments and updates from the world of Block Siege, and what you need to know before downloading the Block Siege game, where you can see the latest updates via the browser and access the website with one click.
